Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled across all successful variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in variants that include Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Average cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in cases that undergo rejections versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION in rejected variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Total resolution time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in variants involving the BUDGET OWNER approval step
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and the end of case where activity 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER occurs

Name: Minimum time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in the most frequent variant (without BUDGET OWNER or PRE_APPROVER)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Average waiting time after Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE until the next approval activity (e.g., Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION, Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER, or Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'

Name: Time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR in variants that include a rejection loop versus those that do not
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Average time between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER in variants where PRE_APPROVER is involved
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Total time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Payment Handled in variants with multiple resubmissions due to rejections
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Payment Handled'

Name: Minimum cycle time of Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE in domestic reimbursement claims (inferred from absence of pre-approval steps)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and the end of the case

Name: Average time from Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE to Request Payment in cases approved directly by SUPERVISOR without intermediate approvers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Request Payment'

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR in variants where rejection occurs after initial approval steps
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Time elapsed between Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE and Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION grouped by year (2017 vs 2018)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and activity 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
